resources.string: Hey, I am Swayam Gupta and I am completing BSc (Hons) Computer Science from Keshav Mahavidyalaya, University of Delhi ."\n""\n"Because of my personal interest in computer science, I learned many programming languages and have a strong base in Java and C++ .
